Key: (Oh, there she is.)
Tohka, here. This is your bento.
Translation: Tohka, aquí. Este es tu bento.

Key: I don't need it today...
Huh?
(D-Did she just say she didn't need it? Tohka?)
Translation: (¿Acaba de decir que no lo necesitaba? ¿Tohka?)

Key:
T-Tohka? What's wrong? Come on, it's your
favorite, right? You didn't eat breakfast either,
so if you skip lunch, you'll be pretty hungry.
Translation:
¿T-Tohka? ¿Qué te pasa? Vamos, es tu favorito,
¿verdad? Tampoco desayunaste, así que si te
saltas el almuerzo, tendrás bastante hambre.

Key: Ngh! A l-lady does not get hungry!

Hahaha! Sounds like your stomach is being more
honest with me.
Translation:
¡Jajaja! Parece que tu estómago está
siendo más honesto conmigo.

Key: I... I don't need it!
It's fine, you don't need to hold back...
―Rgh! I said I do not need it!
O-Ohh...
I-It's fine... I'll clean it up.
S-Shido... I-I apologize... I just, well I...
Translation: S-Shido... Me disculpo... Yo sólo, bueno yo...

Key:
R-Really, it's fine! You don't have to worry
about it. More importantly, your lunch...
Translation:
E-En serio, ¡está bien! No tienes que preocuparte.
Más importante aún, tu almuerzo...

Key: Er, well you see... b-but―

Okay, please sit down, everyone!
Morning homeroom is about to start!
Translation:
¡Bien, por favor, siéntense todos!
La clase de la mañana está a punto de empezar.

Key:
(After that, even when I talked to her, Tohka kept
silent. Class continued on while I sat there
with no idea what to do.)
Translation:
(Después de eso, incluso cuando le hablé, Tohka
guardó silencio. La clase continuó mientras yo
permanecía sentado sin saber qué hacer).

Key:
(With Tohka closed up like a clam in front of me,
all I could do was wait for time to pass...)
Translation:
(Con Tohka cerrada como una almeja frente a mí, lo único
que podía hacer era esperar a que pasara el tiempo...)
